00037 class CSwordBibleModuleInfo : public CSwordModuleInfo  {
00038 public: 
00042     CSwordBibleModuleInfo( CSwordBackend* backend, SWModule* module  );
00046     ~CSwordBibleModuleInfo();
00054   virtual const unsigned int getVerseCount( const unsigned int book, const unsigned int chapter ) const;
00059   virtual const unsigned int getChapterCount( const unsigned int book ) const;
00063   virtual QStringList* getBooks();
00067   virtual const CSwordModuleInfo::type getType() const;
00071   const unsigned int getBookNumber(const QString &book);
00072 
00073 private:
00074     QStringList*    m_bookList; //This booklist is cached
00075     QString m_cachedLocale;
00076 };
00077 
00078 inline const CSwordModuleInfo::type CSwordBibleModuleInfo::getType() const {
00079     return CSwordModuleInfo::Bible;
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline const unsigned int CSwordBibleModuleInfo::getBookNumber(const QString &book){
00083   if (!m_bookList)
00084     getBooks();
00085   return  (m_bookList->findIndex(book)+1);
00086 }
